name: 2019 International Artificial Intelligence Technology Conference (AITC 2019) will be held during November,27-29, 2019 in Hangzhou, China.
content: Conference official website：http://www.aitc.org Meeting time：November,27-29, 2019\. Meeting place：Hangzhou, China/Hangzhou Dianzi University. Host unit：ACM Singapore Chapter. keynote speaker： Prof. Chin-Chen Chang from Feng Chia University of Taiwan. Prof. Li Jianjun from Hangzhou Dianzi University of China. Published by： All peer reviewed and accepted papers, after presentation, will be published into the conference proceedings by ACM, which will be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, and to be submitted and reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (CPCI). Call for Papers： AI Algorithms. Artificial Intelligence tools & Applications. Automatic Control. Bioinformatics. Natural Language Processing. CAD Design & Testing. Computer Vision and Speech Understanding. Computational Theories of Learning. Hybrid Intelligent Systems. Information Retrieval. Intelligent System Architectures. Knowledge Representation. Knowledge-based Systems. Mechatronics. Important Dates Deadline (full text) : July 10, 2019\. Deadline (abstract) : August 05, 2019\. Registration Deadline: August 25, 2019\. Conference Contact : Ms. Daisy Zheng mailbox: aitc@acm-sg.org Tel: +86-021-59561560
